array.string: Let's get started with today's training!
We'll [[emph+]]now do a series of [[emph+]]steps [[emph-]]to [[emph+]]get ready [[emph+]]for today's [[emph+]]training.
Please rest both of your arms on the table. [[slnc 400]]
Great, those are the right targets. [[slnc 600]]
Thank you.
Please sit down at the table [[slnc 300]]and touch the pink button when you are ready[[slnc 500]].
One moment while we get you some assistance.
Before you sit down, let's set your table for the day. [[slnc 600]]
Please place the targets in the table locations shown. [[slnc 500]]
Remove a target by touching it's blue button. [[slnc 500]]
Then touch the pink button when you are ready.
Please have a seat at the table.
Now, stand behind the table, at the [[emph +]]taped marking on the floor. [[slnc 500]]
Then, please face towards the system.
The targets with a red [[emph +]]"X" are incorrect. [[slnc 800]]
Please check those targets again, then touch the pink button when ready.
First you will do a set of five reaches to the[[emph +]]cone. [[slnc 1500]]
To start each reach, make sure your right wrist is on the rest pad. [[slnc 500]]
If you are not on the rest pad, you will hear the sound of seagulls:
This is a reminder to return your wrist to the rest pad. [[slnc 1500]]
When the base lights up,[[slnc 300]]you can begin reaching to the cone. [[slnc 1500]]
Grasp your hand as best as you can around the cone,
until you see a green light at the top. [[slnc 1700]]
Then release the cone,[[slnc 200]]and return your wrist back to the rest pad. [[slnc 1500]]
and wait for the base to light up again. [[slnc 1500]]
Would you like to go over this again?
[[slnc 350]] Welcome.[[slnc 550]] Please touch the pink button on the table to begin.
Please put the wristband on your right [[emph +]]wrist, as shown. [[slnc 300]]
Make sure your chair[[emph +]]legs are placed inside the [[emph +]]taped marking on the floor.[[slnc 300]]
Great work today. You have now completed your session. [[slnc 300]]
Please press the button to turn off the system.
While you are reaching to the cone, you may see the light change to yellow or red.[[slnc 1500]]
Try to keep the light white while you reach.
After a reach, you will see a path of rocks that lead to a boat.
To get to the boat, try to create a straight path of white rocks.
After a reach, you will see a path of rocks that lead to a boat.
To get to the boat, try to create a straight path of white rocks.
Also, make sure you lift the fog so the boat is visible.
After you have completed five reaches, you will see the boat you will use to travel.
Try to create a boat that is straight and smooth, so it can travel easily.
If you bend forward too much while reaching, you will hear this sound:
This is an indicator to keep your body back while you reach.
Sorry, the system can't see your [[emph+]]wrist [[emph-]]marker. [[slnc 500]]
Please return your wrist to the rest pad, then press the button when you're ready.
